Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 17th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1986...
Injured on 4/12/1987 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/1/1988 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 4/30/1989 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/11/1991 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 4/27/1992 with a Bruised Foot, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1993, off Alex Fernandez (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/23/1993, off Satoru Komiyama (ATL)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1993, hitting .319 with 8 HR, 78 RBI...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Chicago (N) on 7/12/1994...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1994, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 12 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Cincinnati on 8/8/1995...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1995, hitting .577 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against San Francisco on 5/23/1997...
Was selected to the 1997 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/10/1997 with a Broken Finger, out for 5 weeks...
